rooms.description: Large entrance hall with foyer to welcome guests.
Spacious living area for relaxation and social gatherings, aligned according to Vastu principles.
Separate dining space adjacent to the kitchen with adequate natural lighting.
Fully equipped kitchen designed for modern living and ease of workflow.
Dedicated home office with soundproofing and ergonomic design to support work from home requirements.
Functional bathroom for guests or quick use.

openings.description: Large glass door entrance aligned with Vastu principles to invite positive energy.
Multiple windows ensuring ample natural light and cross ventilation.
Balcony overlooking the garden for aesthetic appeal.

garden.description: Expansive garden designed with a mix of greenery and water features, providing a serene environment.
